# OpenAlternative - Open Source Alternatives to Popular Software
A curated collection of the best open source alternatives to everyday SaaS products. Save money with reliable tools hand-picked for you.

## Blog Highlights
Links to our most popular blog posts.

- [7 Open Source Tools for Better Website Analytics](https://openalternative.co/blog/7-open-source-tools-for-website-analytics)
- [How Open Source Companies Make Money?](https://openalternative.co/blog/how-open-source-companies-make-money)
- [Top 5 Open Source Projects for Developers](https://openalternative.co/blog/top-5-open-source-projects-for-developers)

## Open source tools
- [Karakeep](https://openalternative.co/karakeep): Open Source Alternative to Pocket, Omnivore and Raindrop
- [Zed](https://openalternative.co/zed): Open Source Alternative to Cursor, Windsurf and GitHub Copilot
- [Notesnook](https://openalternative.co/notesnook): Open Source Alternative to Obsidian, Notion and Google Keep
- [Void](https://openalternative.co/void): Open Source Alternative to Cursor, Windsurf and GitHub Copilot

- [Linkwarden](https://openalternative.co/linkwarden): Open Source Alternative to Pocket, Omnivore and Raindrop
